original_text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the Passover Feast, many believed in his name when they saw the signs that he was doing.
korean_text: 유월절에 예수께서 예루살렘에 계시니 많은 사람이 그의 행하시는 표적을 보고 그의 이름을 믿었으나

sentences.original_text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the Passover Feast,
when they saw the signs that he was doing.
